title: New free champion rotation: Lucian, Cassiopeia, Xin Zhao and more!

replies.body:
**A Corporate Matter: Episode 21:**

{{champion:119}} "Draven would like to to welcome everyone to, **DRAVEN'S POOL PARTY!"**

{{champion:86}} **"HUZZAH!"**

{{champion:119}} "I am also glad that my friend, corporate lee sin. Managed to bring two of his corporate buddy's over. Even though one isn't wearing the proper attire. Big hand to Corporate Gnar and Pool Party/Corporate Mundo."

{{champion:36}} "Pool Party Mundo glad he finally listen to employee. Me agree that this place is hopping. Me bring music stick for all to enjoy playing of."

{{champion:150}} "_(I hate you all)_ Glad to be here."
_"Smiles"_

{{champion:55}} "Hey, someone sabotaged the pool. All the water is gone, WHO DID THIS."

{{champion:268}} **"AND SOMEONE BLOCKED OUT THE SUN! SHURIMA WAS BUILT ON THE LIGHT OF THE SUN. POWER FADING, SHURIMA CANT EXIST WITHOUT SUN. CAN'T BREATHE, NEED, SUN. GOODBYE. I AM NO MORE. THIS IS THE END FOR ME. GO ON, YOU DONT NEED TO SEE THIS. AHHHHHHHH. SHURIMA!"**

{{champion:119}} "And here i thought i was dramatic."

{{champion:150}} "Shouldn't, there like. Be someone watching out around here?"

{{champion:104}} "Yeah, Where is Pool Party Renekton?"

{{champion:58}} "Huh? **OOPS!** i might have fallen asleep, what did i miss?"

{{champion:122}} "Well, all the water is gone, someone blocked out the sun. My brother is still annoying. Azir is freaking out on the floor over there. Katarina is starting to look real stabby. And we are all mad at you."

{{champion:64}} "I knew we should have gone with Pool Party Thresh, he woulda made a much better life guard and look out. I would have done it, but you know."

{{champion:119}} "No worry's everyone. Leo, give us a little light. Zac, you know what to do about the pool."

{{champion:89}} "I AM THE LIGHTBRINGER!!!!"

{{champion:150}} "So, you're useless and replaced?"

{{champion:268}} "YES, SUNLIGHT. SHURIMA CAN LIVE AGAIN. SHURIMA!!!!!"

{{champion:104}} "Alright everyone, lets swim.

_A few minutes later at, the now hip, party._

{{champion:36}} "Pool Party Mundo will play song now. Any requests?"

{{champion:58}} **"PLAY CROCODILE ROCK!"**

{{champion:268}} "**PLAY FREEBIRD, FOR SHURIMA!** Wait, last time i tried to do that. I was betrayed and everything i know and love destroyed. **NEVERMIND!**

{{champion:104}} "So, how do you think zac fixed the pool so fast?"

{{champion:154}} "Hello."

{{champion:64}} "Ah! Didnt see that coming. So, we are just swimming inside of you right now?"

{{champion:154}} "Yeah, i am just made of living water. Its pretty cozy actually."

{{champion:104}} "LULU! GET OUT OF THE POOL!"

{{champion:115}} "Hmmm, i wonder how he would react to a cannonball. only one way to find out. **LOOK OUT BELOW!!!!**"

{{champion:64}} **"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"**

_Over at the sand box:_

{{champion:1}} "Oh hey lulu, whats wrong with you?"

{{champion:117}} "I don't want to talk about it. Hey, wanna see something funny?"

{{champion:1}} "Sure."

[Visual Reference:](http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2F2new1.fjcdn.com%2Fgifs%2FPool%2Bparty%2Blulu_4c7b12_5575325.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425)

{{champion:117}} "I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid."

{{champion:1}} **"STOP!!!"**

{{champion:117}} **"I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid. I'm a kid. I'm a Squid."**

{{champion:1}} **"AHHHHHH!"**
_"Throws Fireball."_

_Swirl, swirl, poof._

{{champion:101}} **"NOOOOOOOOO, THE SAND HAS BURNED AND TURNED TO GLASS."**

{{champion:72}} **"HOW DARE YOU CHILD, DO YOU NOT REALIZE WHAT YOU HAVE DONE?"**

{{champion:101}} "We shall have a talk with you. You see, we must all be guardians of the precious sand. Lulu, you can leave."

_Over at DRAAAAAAAVEN:_

{{champion:119}} "I must find out who would want to stop this pool party. **COME MY TRUSTY STEED. LET US INVESTIGATE.**"

{{champion:421}} _"Noises"_

{{champion:119}} "Pool Party Rek'sai, use your tremor sense to find out who did this. **DRAVEN, AWAY!!**"

Over in the woods nearby:

{{champion:63}} "Yes, if i can't enjoy a pool party. **NO ONE CAN HAHAHAH!** I'm sure they are all still so upset, that my smoke blocked out the sun. And that was really nice work you did on the pool. If only i could see their reactions."

{{champion:267}} "How dare they not account for us who need salt water. Only having a fresh water pool is so inconsiderate. So no pool for anyone. Hey, do you suddenly hear a symphony orchestra?"

{{champion:63}} "Yeah, it sounds like its getting closer. and playing faster. Oh no, i think we are about to get eaten."

{{champion:421}} **"RAWR!!!!!!"**

{{champion:119}} "**DRAVEN!!** So, you are who sabotaged the pool party. Well, draven can't have that. Soooo, here is an axe to the face!"
"Throws axe!"

{{champion:63}} "Ha, you missed. You are one- **AHHHHH! MY SHOULDER! NOT FAIR, YOU CAN'T HAVE TWO OF THEM.**"

{{champion:119}} "All is fair in love and Draven."

{{champion:63}} "Come on man, this axe really hurts. Yet it isn't bleeding, like, at all. That is really weird."

{{champion:267}} "Don't worry, let me heal you. Then we can take them on."

{{champion:63}} Heal me? How are you going to. **WAIT, NAMI NOOOO. IT WON'T WORK HOW YOU THINK IT WILL. I AM MADE OF- AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"**
_*noises* _{{champion:421}}
{{champion:421}} _"Seductive noises"_

this ^ LOL 
{{item:3151}}
_"seductive chiming"_{{champion:432}}

Alright, who is downvoting all the comments except the one guy with no sense of humor at the bottom?
Some men just wanna watch the world burn.

Anyway, Pool Party Mundo has some versions of his performance to share:

[Freebird:](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5UgqYJpMxQo)

[Crocodile Rock:](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0U1eN5He8KY)
LMAO, "All is fair in love and Draven." I'm dyin over here, someone send Nurse Akali

RIP Brand 2015

Nami can be so cruel sometimes. Although she COULD just make a pool, being the Tidecaller and all.

Its not about the pool. Its about how inconsiderate they were. How could they not provide a way for her to have fun. 

It would be like Vlad going there and them not having a place for him to drink gluten-free blood in the shade.

Just, plain, selfish.

Poor Nami...

If she spoke up I'd have a pool for her for sure! >~<
By God, how much time did you take on that? It must have been {{summoner:3}}ing!
About 1-2 hours. Not that hard. Plus i find it to be pretty fun/relaxing.

Hoo, boy! I couldn't ever spend that much time on a comment. 
For that, I praise you.
Heheh splatoon hehehe
Why do people even like these short stories? They sound like a 13 year old wrote them with the type of comedy, and they aren't even witty or anything?
I wasn't trying to sound rude, I actually want to know why people find these remotely interesting.

" Heal me? How are you going to. WAIT, NAMI NOOOO"
Sounds like the type of fanfic that would come out of 4chan.
